solution_line_template: The ants have {ant_legs} legs because {num_ants} times {legs_per_ant} equals <<{num_ants}*{legs_per_ant}={ant_legs}>>{ant_legs}
The spiders have {spider_legs} legs because {num_spiders} times {legs_per_spider} equals <<{num_spiders}*{legs_per_spider}={spider_legs}>>{spider_legs}.
There are a total of {total_legs} legs because {ant_legs} plus {spider_legs} equals <<{ant_legs}+{spider_legs}={total_legs}>>{total_legs}.
